TopicTitle: Maneuver node burn time resets every time map view is entered

Articles.Content:
KSP Version (Build ID):  10624168

OS: Windows 10

CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 (12) @ 3.600GHz

GPU: AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT

Description of Bug: While performing a burn at a maneuver node, entering the map view resets the time remaining for that burn. This results in burns that are much to long, which results in an undesired trajectory for the spacecraft.
